data.name: Dragon's Dogma: Dark Arisen Masterworks Collection Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The awe-inspiring Dragon’s Dogma: Dark Arisen Masterworks Collection soundtrack contains 53 songs including a handful of alternate versions not included in the original game.

The two+ hour soundtrack has been reauthored from the original source material. Includes both 16-bit MP3 (320Kbps) and 24-bit FLAC lossless formats. (Total download size: 1.74GB)

IMPORTANT NOTE: FLAC version must be downloaded manually by ticking the checkbox under the 'DLC' section.

Soundtrack files can be found under the game's installation directory below:
\\Steam\steamapps\common\DDDA\#SOUNDTRACK\


Track List:


  • 1. Main Title ~Dark Arisen~
  • 2. A Request ~Olra~
  • 3. Bitterblack Isle
  • 4. Into the Dark Depth
  • 5. Normal Battle ~Bitterblack Isle~
  • 6. A Presence
  • 7. Pitch-Black Pursuer ~Death Battle~
  • 8. Life Cycle ~Barrock~
  • 9. Duskmoon Tower
  • 10. Contemptuous Prisoner ~Gorecyclops Battle~
  • 11. Impulse ~Drake battle~
  • 12. The Arisen's Refuge
  • 13. An air of conflict ~Bitterblack Isle~
  • 14. Shrine of Futile Truths ~Gazer Battle~
  • 15. Necrophagous Beasts
  • 16. Fortress of Remembrance
  • 17. Battle of Despair ~Bitterblack Isle~
  • 18. Puppet & Master ~Cursed Dragon & Dark Bishop Battle~
  • 19. At the End of a Deadly Battle
  • 20. The Fallen City
  • 21. Leave Nothing Behind
  • 22. Coils of Light ~Dark Arisen Main Theme~
  • 23. Out of the Ring
  • 24. Proof
  • 25. In the Crucible where Droplets Gather, I Wait
  • 26. Opening Movie -“Dragon’s Dogma OST” Music Selection-
  • 27. Main Title -“Dragon’s Dogma OST” Music Selection-
  • 28. Cassardis -“Dragon’s Dogma OST” Music Selection-
  • 29. The Land that Breathes ~Gransys~ -“Dragon’s Dogma OST” Music Selection-
  • 30. One-eyed Giant ~Cyclops Battle~ -“Dragon’s Dogma OST” Music Selection-
  • 31. An Air of Conflict -“Dragon’s Dogma OST” Music Selection-
  • 32. Danger at Dawn ~Hydra Battle~ -“Dragon’s Dogma OST” Music Selection-
  • 33. The Path to Spoils -“Dragon’s Dogma OST” Music Selection-
  • 34. Gran Soren -“Dragon’s Dogma OST” Music Selection-
  • 35. Lure of the Abyss -“Dragon’s Dogma OST” Music Selection-
  • 36. Hillfigure Knoll -“Dragon’s Dogma OST” Music Selection-
  • 37. The Duke's Demesne -“Dragon’s Dogma OST” Music Selection-
  • 38. Griffin's Bane ~Griffin Battle~ -“Dragon’s Dogma OST” Music Selection-
  • 39. Star-scattered Night ~Gransys~ -“Dragon’s Dogma OST” Music Selection-
  • 40. Farewell -“Dragon’s Dogma OST” Music Selection-
  • 41. Deny Salvation -“Dragon’s Dogma OST” Music Selection-
  • 42. The Tainted Mountain -“Dragon’s Dogma OST” Music Selection-
  • 43. Clash of Fates ~Dragon Battle~ -“Dragon’s Dogma OST” Music Selection-
  • 44. Beyond the Rift -“Dragon’s Dogma OST” Music Selection-
  • 45. Fateful Decision -“Dragon’s Dogma OST” Music Selection-
  • 46. You Shall Live On -“Dragon’s Dogma OST” Music Selection-
  • 47. The Lorekeepers -“Dragon’s Dogma OST” Music Selection-
  • 48. Eternal Return ~Dragon’s Dogma Main Theme~ -“Dragon’s Dogma OST” Music Selection-
  • 49. Respite -“Dragon’s Dogma OST” Unreleased Track-
  • 50. Life and Sin -“Dragon’s Dogma OST” Unreleased Track-
  • 51. He who Hath Returned -“Dragon’s Dogma OST” Unreleased Track-
  • 52. Imminent Triumph ~Self Guitar Arrange ver.~ -Bonus Track-
  • 53. Eternal Return ~Self Piano Arrange ver.~ -Bonus Track-
